description: This new model of space cruiser has a streamlined shape which allows it to survive atmospheric re-entry, and its rockets can also function as jet engines for atmospheric flight. With the aid of a booster rocket, the Zanzibar can launch back into space to complete its round trip. This powerful warship is armed with one main gun turret, four fixed-position mega particle cannons, five anti-aircraft machine gun turrets, and a pair of large missile launchers.
name: Zanzibar
